Package cz.cuni.mff.soukups3.PipeWeb

Class DefaultFolderTree

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.soukups3.PipeWeb.DefaultFolderTree
All Implemented Interfaces:
FolderTree
public class DefaultFolderTree extends Object implements FolderTree
This is the default implementation of the FolderTree interface.
